entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:58 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 04:30 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure: 99.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -2.2°C
Wind: W 33 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in the Canada Bay area this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 20 March 2023
